<h3 id="X38141">X(38141) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(5), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6+4*b*c*a^5-2*b*c*(b+c)*a^4-(6*b^4+6*c^4-7*b*c*(b^2+c^2))*a^3+6*(b^3-c^3)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(4*b^2-11*b*c+4*c^2)*a-4*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38141) = 5*X(5)-2*X(3035) = 2*X(5)+X(22938) = 4*X(5)-X(33814) = X(11)+2*X(546) = 2*X(11)+X(22799) = 4*X(546)-X(22799) = 4*X(3035)+5*X(22938) = 8*X(3035)-5*X(33814) = X(21154)-3*X(23513) = 2*X(21154)-3*X(34126) = 7*X(21154)-9*X(38069) = X(21154)-9*X(38077) = 4*X(21154)-9*X(38084) = 2*X(22938)+X(33814) = 7*X(23513)-3*X(38069) = X(23513)-3*X(38077) = 4*X(23513)-3*X(38084) = 7*X(34126)-6*X(38069) = X(34126)-6*X(38077) = 2*X(34126)-3*X(38084)</b>
<p>X(38141) lies on these lines: {5,3035}, {11,546}, {30,21154}, {100,3851}, {104,3843}, {119,3850}, {149,3855}, {355,26726}, {381,952}, {382,31272}, {515,38044}, {516,38180}, {517,38161}, {528,38071}, {550,6667}, {971,38173}, {1387,10896}, {1484,3858}, {1503,38168}, {1656,10724}, {1862,7547}, {2802,38140}, {2829,3845}, {3091,10738}, {3564,38147}, {3627,6713}, {3628,24466}, {3832,10742}, {3856,37726}, {3857,11698}, {3859,37725}, {5055,34474}, {5068,13199}, {5762,38159}, {5842,38184}, {5843,38152}, {5844,38156}, {5848,38136}, {5851,38137}, {5854,38138}, {5856,38139}, {6174,11737}, {6246,9955}, {6702,22793}, {10893,22791}, {10895,12735}, {12138,35488}, {12571,12611}, {12619,18483}, {12737,18492}, {16174,18480}, {17577,34123}, {28146,38133}, {28160,32557}, {28174,34122}, {28186,38032}, {28202,38104}, {28212,38128}, {31235,35018}</p>
<p>
X(38141) = reflection of X(34126) in X(23513)<br>
X(38141) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 22938, 33814), (11, 546, 22799), (381, 38034, 38142), (6246, 9955, 19907), (23513, 34126, 38084)<br>
</p>
